item.description: We now are ready to shoot our designer concept and need to complete our style team to get it done. The clothing is beautiful and the models are in the selection phase. Our concept is ironed out with the photographer and fashion stylists on board. We could use a helping hand, but you must be committed. Makeup, hair, wardrobe assistant, prop/set, and photo assistant needed. Our meeting will begin promptly at 6pm to review details and assign tasks. Here is your chance to build your book. Our location is accessible by T - just get off at Back Bay, Copley or Prudential. You can choose to drive. Parking options are everywhere.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at Starbucks at the Marriott Copley at Copley place.

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: Crew call
